
{{alias}}( [α, β] )
    Returns a beta distribution object.

    If `α <= 0` or `β <= 0`, the function throws an error.

    If not provided `α` and `β`, the returned distribution uses default parameter values `α = 1.0` and `β = 1.0`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    α: number
        First shape parameter. Default: `1.0`.

    β: number
        Second shape parameter. Default: `1.0`.

    Returns
    -------
    dist: Object
        Distribution instance.

    Examples
    --------
    > var dist = {{alias}}( 1.0, 1.0 );
    > var out = dist.cdf( 0.8 );
    0.8
    > out = dist.mean
    0.5

    See Also
    --------
